sent.orig: Background: Coronary artery disease (CAD) is a common disease of cardiovascular system.
sent.trans: 研究背景冠心病(Coronary artery disease,CAD)是一类严重危害人类健康、影响人们生活质量的常见疾病。

sent.orig: Mad cow disease,or bovine spongiform encephalopathy(BSE),is a chronic,transmissible,fatal neurodegenerative disorder disease in cattle.
sent.trans: 疯牛病(mad cow disease),即牛传染性海绵状脑病(bovine transmissible spongiform encephalopathy,BSE)的俗称，是一种慢性消耗性、致死性、中枢神经系统退行性疾病。

sent.orig: Keshan Disease and Kashin-Beck are a kind of regional disease, which has highly incidence a disease.
sent.trans: 克山病、大骨节病是一种地方性疾病，其分布范围较广，发病率较高。

sent.orig: Newcastle disease is an acute infectious disease caused by Newcastle disease virus in chicken and turkey.
sent.trans: 新城疫是由新城疫病毒引起的鸡和火鸡的一种急性高度接触性传染病。

sent.orig: Chronic copper toxicity will bring respiratory disease, disease of ocular conjunctivitis, skin disease and so on.
sent.trans: 慢性铜中毒，会引起呼吸系统疾病、眼部疾病、皮肤疾病等。
